from_number.description: Please enter your Twilio Phone Number with country code (Eg.+13345395652)

auth_token.description: Please enter your Twilio Auth Token

agent_api_key.description: Please enter your Freshservice Agent API Key

domain.description: Please enter your Full Domain Name (eg: subdomain.freshservice.com) don't include https
